title: How to Spare the Royal Guards in Undertale

steps.title: Enter the fight with the royal guards.
steps.content: Enter the fight with the royal guards. This will happen after they realize that you are a human.

steps.title: Choose the Act button.
steps.content: Choose the Act button. Use this option on Royal Guard 02, while choosing "Clean armor" as the action. This is your turn.

steps.title: Wait for the royal guard's turn.
steps.content: Wait for the royal guard's turn. They will attack you with their usual four pointed stars, but there will also be a green projectile. Make your soul touch this green projectile at least five times.

steps.title: This turn, choose the act button and use the "Whisper" action on Royal Guard 01.
steps.content: This turn, choose the act button and use the "Whisper" action on Royal Guard 01.

steps.title: Dodge another attack.
steps.content: Dodge another attack. This will be easier than the other attacks because 02 is weakened, and his attacks will fly off the screen.

steps.title: Listen as 01 talks to 02 about how much he enjoyed fighting with him.
steps.content: Listen as 01 talks to 02 about how much he enjoyed fighting with him. After 01 accepts 02 offer to go out to ice cream, you are able to choose mercy and spare the royal guards.
